scripts.api: pnpm --filter @simulacrum/api run build && pnpm --filter @simulacrum/api run dev
scripts.dev: pnpm -r run build && (pnpm --filter @simulacrum/api run infra:clawdbots & pnpm --filter @simulacrum/ui run dev & wait)
scripts.infra:reset: pnpm --filter @simulacrum/api run build && pnpm --filter @simulacrum/api run infra:reset
scripts.infra:seed: pnpm --filter @simulacrum/api run build && pnpm --filter @simulacrum/api run infra:seed
scripts.infra:smoke:live: pnpm --filter @simulacrum/api run build && pnpm --filter @simulacrum/api run infra:smoke:live
scripts.infra:smoke:autonomous: pnpm --filter @simulacrum/api run build && pnpm --filter @simulacrum/api run infra:smoke:autonomous
scripts.infra:demo: pnpm --filter @simulacrum/api run build && pnpm --filter @simulacrum/api run infra:demo
scripts.infra:autonomous: pnpm --filter @simulacrum/api run build && pnpm --filter @simulacrum/api run infra:autonomous
scripts.infra:clawdbots: pnpm --filter @simulacrum/api run build && pnpm --filter @simulacrum/api run infra:clawdbots
